short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly open a map by selecting some text or address, right-click, and select MapIt!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly open a map using one of several popular mapping services such as Google Maps™, Mapquest™, Zillow™, or even Apple Maps (macOS only). Highlight an address, right-click to open a context menu, then select 'MapIt!'. Chrome will open a new tab and display the location using your preferred mapping service. The default is Google Maps.
